basics.label: Manager, Quality Engineering
basics.summary: With over 14 years of experience in the fields of Class II and III medical device manufacturing, molecular diagnostics, and biotechnology; the last 8 of which have been managing engineers, technicians as well as supervisors. Has strong technical leadership, and a solid background in data analysis and statistics. Uses this knowledge to develop and continuously improve all aspects of the manufacturing process with a focus on efficiency and consistency.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Manage the Quality Engineering Team, the Complaints Department, and the Metrology Department at Alcon's Class II and Class III medical device manufacturing facility. Responsible for improving site compliance and reducing recurring deviations.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed the Process Engineering and Automation Groups at Alcon's Class II/III surgically implantable optic device and delivery systems manufacturing facility.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Supervised the Drafting group, Custom Tool Production, Milling, Injection Molding, and Clean Room Engineering Support staff for both Class II and Class III medical device manufacturing.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Engineer responsible for process development and improvement at Alcon's Class II/III medical device manufacturing site.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Designed, built, and tested an automated reagent packaging system to improve lot homogeneity and increase manufacturing throughput of Lab-in-a-tube (LIATTM) technology.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Reviewed patent applications for compliance with the United States Code and determined novelty of invention. Composed reviews of applications and communicated with applicants to assist them through the patent process.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Designed, built, and tested an apparatus for producing sol-gel based DNA hybridization arrays. Developed and troubleshot instrumentation for controlling pad size and placement within an array.

awards.title: Member of Sigma Pi Sigma, Physics student honor society
